title: How to open a public library in india - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe it's quite simple : Finding a place - A comfortable environment with a proper sitting oriented space with calm atmosphere around.Dividing the sections - This will depend on market research and the trend that crowd is more bended towards which section or the age group of crowd in that surrounding.Contact the wholesaler - This is the most important step to keep up the crowd attention and to provide them good quality stuff get in touch with different wholesalers. Or if you want to go big meet up with press publication houses. Completely your call.Content - Make sure that you keep adding material to your book libraryOr the best you can do assumed that you an Ardent Reader is to convert your room or any one room in your house to free library. It simply means barter system one book for another just reach out within your circle first then if you get sign that this is going good then you thought. Make a thing out of it.
